questions.question: What was NVIDIA's total revenue for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Use the consolidated statement of income for the most recent year.

questions.question: How many business segments does NVIDIA report, and what are their names?
questions.answer_hint: Look for the description of reportable segments in the business overview.

questions.question: What was NVIDIA's net income for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Refer to the consolidated statement of income for net income.

questions.question: What were NVIDIA's research and development expenses for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Check the operating expenses section in the income statement.

questions.question: What are some of the primary products or platforms included in the Compute & Networking segment?
questions.answer_hint: Look for the narrative description of the Compute & Networking segment.

questions.question: What are some of the main products or offerings included in the Graphics segment?
questions.answer_hint: Check the description of the Graphics segment in the business section.

questions.question: What were NVIDIA's total operating expenses for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Use the total operating expenses line in the income statement.

questions.question: What was NVIDIA's basic net income per share for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: See the net income per share data in the income statement.

questions.question: What was NVIDIA's diluted net income per share for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Look directly below the basic earnings per share line.

questions.question: How did NVIDIA's revenue in the year ended January 26, 2025 compare to the prior year?
questions.answer_hint: Compare the revenue line across the last two fiscal years.

questions.question: What were NVIDIA's cost of revenue for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Refer to the cost of revenue line in the income statement.

questions.question: What types of platforms or solutions does NVIDIA offer for data centers?
questions.answer_hint: Look for mentions of data center platforms and AI solutions in the segment descriptions.

questions.question: What types of products does NVIDIA provide for gaming?
questions.answer_hint: Check the Graphics segment description for gaming-related products.

questions.question: What were NVIDIA's sales, general and administrative expenses for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Find the SG&A line under operating expenses.

questions.question: What were NVIDIA's interest income and interest expense for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Look for the interest income and interest expense lines below operating income.

questions.question: What was NVIDIA's income tax expense for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Check the income tax expense line near the bottom of the income statement.

questions.question: What is NVIDIA's Omniverse Enterprise software used for?
questions.answer_hint: Look in the description of platforms offered for industrial and digital twin applications.

questions.question: What types of automotive platforms does NVIDIA provide?
questions.answer_hint: Check the Compute & Networking segment description for automotive offerings.

questions.question: What types of GPUs does NVIDIA offer for enterprise workstation graphics?
questions.answer_hint: Look for mentions of RTX or similar GPUs in the Graphics segment discussion.

questions.question: What were the weighted average basic and diluted shares used in NVIDIA's per-share computation for the year ended January 26, 2025?
questions.answer_hint: Use the weighted average shares data in the income statement.
